Articles.Content:
Hey guys! This is my first craft that I have uploaded to the forum, so please tell me how it is.

I built a f-22 raptor clone using B9 5.0 prerelease. You MUST have this pack or else it won't work. no Lazor or BDarmory weapons used, although you can add them if you want.

So: here it is.

At ~90 m/s it will pull up automatically, after that, turn on sas and you are good! When you land do not land any faster than 90 m/s. it normally will not end well.

[EDIT] changed engines to look more realistic.

*Machine gun not included, it is BD armory.

DOWNLOAD: https://www.dropbox.com/s/io7zgy90p1zsisl/K-22.craft?dl=0

Edited August 26, 2014 by 88theturbo

If only it flew as good as the mini beast.

Im going to see how good i can make it fly, i do like the design man.
Alright. Thanks! Feel free to put it up on this thread.

no worries man, have not had a chance to actually fly it properly yet still not sure what needs doing, been busy working on a few of my designs tonight.

i want to see if i can get it to do 15g turns though, such a pretty plane should break a neck haha
Yeah, That would be crazy. they should make g's black out kerbs though. like you lose control of your plane for a few seconds.

Yeah, That would be crazy. they should make g's black out kerbs though. like you lose control of your plane for a few seconds.

Surely there would be a mod for that, i know it would snap in half if you used FAR and did a 15g turn though.

Sadly most my planes will not work on FAR because they lose their wings lol
Haha, I will look for a mod that can do that.
Have to admit, better than I could ever do.
